page.title: 19SCHOOL GAMES III BROOMFIELD
page.content:
{ {TOUCH ONCE }First you find a wall about 4 metres long and 5 metres tall. you then pick a group of people and number them 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5th and so on. The first person throws the ball and when the ball rebounds the second person throws if a person misses they are out.
{CHAINY } Choose a person to be it. He/she chases someone and when they have been caught they link hands and chase another person. Once a chain o four people has been formed this splits up into two chains of two. When all but one have been caught then the game is over and the remaining person becomes the it for a new game. You need a big space and lots of children for this game.
